title: Just Got a Ban - In a Game I was Honored In, By a Report From the Leaver
body: Reverse it now Riot.  Consider this my attempt to write you to resolve the issue.  Your methods of reviewing these are indisputably dishonest because they intentionally withhold information.

replies.body:
1) How do you know it's from the leaver?
2) What were you banned for?
3) Honors are often given out trivially. Just because you got an honor doesn't mean you actually did anything.

Additionally;

4) Honors don't exempt you from punishment. You can be Honored and punished in the same match.
Also Umbral, are you acting as an authorized Riot representative in this?  Are you a paid employee?

> Also Umbral, are you acting as an authorized Riot representative in this? Are you a paid employee?

I am not. As Kei143 explained, I'm simply another League player who has a reliable understanding of the Player Behavior systems insofar as one can have without any direct access to them. I'm not paid, I don't speak in any capacity for Riot, I just relay what information I know.

And with that being said;

> Take a look at the chat log. The _complete_ chat log. Review the game. I did nothing deserving the ban.

As I'm just another player, I have no access to your chat log(s). If you want a peer review, you'll have to post the log(s) here yourself; they should appear when you launch the Client.

Otherwise, if you want to appeal your punishment _directly_ with Riot, instead of having your chat logs peer-reviewed by the community, you'll have to file a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I will happily file a ticket, the old system required you to post here.

???

Is this before Season 3?  I don't remember any system requiring you to post here or the old white crappy board.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=344QwhFV,comment-id=000000000001000200000000,timestamp=2019-11-29T05:56:47.537+0000)
>
> ???
> 
> Is this before Season 3?  I don't remember any system requiring you to post here or the old white crappy board.

Some Rioters used to respond over the boards. Back in the day, yes. When the community wasn't so huge and people had time to chat around.
Yes, Rito Lyte, Tantram, and Wookie used to do it.  But it is by no mean a requirement to post here for any kind of support.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=344QwhFV,comment-id=000000000001000200000000,timestamp=2019-11-29T05:56:47.537+0000)
>
> ???
> 
> Is this before Season 3?  I don't remember any system requiring you to post here or the old white crappy board.

IIRC, the oldest versions didn't have an instant feedback system, and no automatic logs.  You had to either file a support ticket or make enough noise on the forum to get a Rioter's attention
You don't need to be authorized or an employee to tell you haven't posted the logs and to know the basics of how the punishment system works.

He's not an employee.  Specialists are just regular players that have alot of knowledge of certain subject. In this case, player behavior.  

Also, their actions doesn't excuse yours. If you've both been disruptive,  the review will increase both the players' toxicity score, and if a player has a toxicity score that passes the threshold,  they will get punished.
I did not say they exempted me.  Take a look at the chat log.  The _complete_ chat log.  Review the game.  I did nothing deserving the ban.
you have to post your COMPLETE chat log so we can see it/them
The...chat long you haven't posted? The one I asked you to post?
Everyone else left quickly.  The leaver said he would report me.

>Everyone else left quickly. 

it takes at most 5 seconds to click report, select a report check box and click submit. no context necessary to comment for the report to count

>The leaver said he would report me.

so? 

1. sometimes people are in too much of a rush to go into the next that they forget to report

2. even if he did report, if you did nothing wrong then nothing happens, leaver, winner. loser,  carry or otherwise. it doesn't matter how many people click report

Honestly that's ignorant.  There is no human review in most cases.  In fact reporting this back got the AI highlighting of what I said.  The AI was upset that I was proud of outdamaging the lane partner I was with "That damage graph though!" was flagged.  Don't be a blind follower.

>Honestly that's ignorant. 

pot calling the kettle black

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

>The AI was upset that I was **harrassing the lane partner by pointing out i was better than him in this particular field for no other reason than to gloat and put him down**

ftfy

You can be honored and reported in the same game by the same person. 

Just because you got honored doesn't make their reports invalid.
Chat logs where?
Rioters don't read these boards (if they do it's very rarely) so your best bet is to create a support ticket. We can't do anything for you here.

> [{quoted}](name=Krissi2197,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=344QwhFV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-29T04:05:27.273+0000)
>
> Rioters don't read these boards (if they do it's very rarely) so your best bet is to create a support ticket. We can't do anything for you here.

I miss the days when there were a couple Rioters patrolling player behavior to call out people who lied about their chat logs/how they were banned or withheld information. Really fun times on the boards. I can't even remember which Rioters did it

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

>I can't even remember which Rioters did it

that would be Tantram. he moved on to other projects some time ago

> [{quoted}](name=Sinful Succubus,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=344QwhFV,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-11-29T06:54:16.560+0000)
>
> that would be Tantram. he moved on to other projects some time ago

Yeah that sounds right! If he's happy I'm happy, but I can't lie and say it wasn't fun reading through those. I might be remembering wrong but I think another one did it too, just FAR less frequently, that's why I said Rioters. Thanks for the memories.

Talks about Riot intentioanlly withholding information.

Does not provide the full information about his ban himself.

Listen, as long as you refuse to provide us with all the information you received from Riot (exact ban reason, cahtlogs etc...) we will assume your ban is correct.
I don't owe you anything.  I was doing this to flag Riot because I thought that was the process.  I fixed it and sent a review request through support.  It still hasn't been reviewed by a human.

> [{quoted}](name=hshtagniemehrcdu,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=344QwhFV,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-11-29T10:34:11.627+0000)
>
> Talks about Riot intentioanlly withholding information.
> 
> Does not provide the full information about his ban himself.
> 
> Listen, as long as you refuse to provide us with all the information you received from Riot (exact ban reason, cahtlogs etc...) we will assume your ban is correct.

Hahhahahahahahahah like a lawyer... 100% of ppl are innocent until proven quilty..... But in real life u have to prove your innocence too
